content: @Colleen Petrik, we are working on completing a 0.1° integration with CESM. @Kristen Krumhardt and I were brainstorming on exploring how mesoscale dynamics mediate trophic transfer efficiency. I wonder if we might explore applying FEISTY to the 0.1° solution—and perhaps consider making explicit comparisons between these results and an application to the same solutions after applying some spatial smoothing operator.
Sounds like a good idea to me.
